code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{CardList}from'./components/cars-list/card-list.component.jsx';import{SearchBox}from'./components/search-box/search-box.component.jsx';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class App extends Component{constructor(){super();this.handleChange=e=>{this.setState({searchField:e.target.value});};this.state={monsters:[],searchField:''};this.handleChange=this.handleChange.bind(this);}componentDidMount(){fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users').then(response=>response.json()).then(users=>this.setState({monsters:users}));}render(){const{monsters,searchField}=this.state;const filteredMonsters=monsters.filter(monster=>monster.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchField.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Monster Rolodex "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBox,{placeholder:"search monsters",handlechange:this.handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardList,{monsters:filteredMonsters})]});}}export default App;
